column2: Total No. of Cases for Investigation including Pending Cases (Col. 2)
column4: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Refused (Col. 4)
column5: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False/Mistake of Fact or Law Etc. (Col. 5)
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col. 6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Sheets were Submitted (Col. 7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Total (Col. 8) = (Col. 5) + (Col. 6) + (Col. 7)
